channel.title: video on Just a Memo
channel.description: Recent content in video on Just a Memo

item.title: ffmpeg
item.description: Split videos and music file into chunks 可以是webm, mp3 或其他 video文件； -segment_time 后面的参数是秒； ffmpeg -i music.webm -f segment -segment_time 4000 -c copy output%03d.webm 把当前的目录内所有的mov文件转换成MP4 %filename: convert.sh #!/bin/bash

item.title: Video
item.description: Video Combine Combine multiple flvs into one emerge -avq mplayer mencoder -forceidx -of lavf -oac pcm -ovc copy -o film.flv 1.flv 2.flv 3.flv 4.flv 5.flv 6.flv 7.flv 8.flv 9.flv Spit One mp4 into multiple mp4 ffmpeg -i 5大運動傷害搶先知.mp4 -c copy -map 0 -segment_time 00:01:30 -f segment -f segment output%03d.mp4 Video Downloader youtube youtub
